document_data.name: Rillo Leadstopper
document_data.mainbody: '''Rillo Leadstopper''' was a [[gnome]] tinkerer in [[Phlan]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: After the death of his wife, Rillo and his daughter [[Villonah Leadstopper|Villonah]] always became at odds with each other. Even at a young age, Villonah had regularly got into with the law. Typically, she was captured by the [[Knights of the Black Fist]] and released after Rillo paid for the damage she did.
document_data.History: In the 1480s [[DR]],{{ToD-time}} Villonah disappeared, prompting Rillo to go to [[Madame Freona's Tea Kettle]] to hire some adventurers to help him find her.{{Cite adventurers league/Defiance in Phlan|27}}
